title: How to get Spotify Premium forever - Quora

response.answer_text: At the time of this answer, Spotify no longer offers LifeTime Premium subscriptions. The idea pops up on the Spotify Community Message and Idea board every so often. Your best bet is to upvote the idea to let Spotify know that this is something you’re interested in. Ideas that receive a lot of upvotes are pushed to the Spotify development team for consideration. [iOS][Subscription] Lifetime subscription
